title: Continue the Story, Credit: iAkeno
body:
I really love this idea! Basically how it works is each person says one thing to contribute to make a story and you keep commenting to keep it going . (WE NEED MORE OF THESE!!!) 

Once again Thanks iAkeno Awesome idea, The Story Starts:

Welcome to Summoners Rift..

replies.body:
RANDY ORTON OUTTA NO WHERE RKO'D NOCTURN, The Announcer shouted _"WATCH OUT WATCH OUT.... RKO"_

THE CROWD WENT WILD

(wow im done....) 

Riven was so Confused as to what had happened she thanked Randy Orton and decided to move toward the Mid Lane 

(seriously WTF XD)
As he roared a mighty laugh, he approached her for the kill. Riven had to snap out of this state, She shook her head faced Nocturne and
Nightmarish thoughts rush through her mind. She feels a weight in her limbs, and feels almost immobile. With a passing moment, she finds herself in a dream like state of fear.

As she stood over Nasus' body in Triumph, She noticed the bushes moving on her right, the Charge of the minions were enough for her to win the battle she decided to investigate. the closer she got to the bush everything became darker.. Whispers of laughter and mysterious voices clouded her every thought.

She heard a blade unsheath, She turned to see a dark object hurdling towards her with terrifying White eyes. It was Nocturne

Riven enters the battle field, her broken sword of Ionia gracefully dancing around her, mowing down her foes as if they were mere blades of grass. 

'The cycle of life and death was not in your favour today, Nasus!' she says with a devilish smirk, as she takes the final blow on the Shuriman god, ending his life.

"Damn fool" whispered Riven to herself, "Doesn't he know what sarcasm is." 

Thirty seconds until minions spawn...

"Ahh, damn he's wasted my time again." Quickly she grabbed her items from the shopkeeper, throwing her gold at him... "What the hell is this, 89 armor at level one!? How is this fair!" Muttered Riven to herself, "And why can't that useless shop keeper do his job right, what the hell does this ring even do?"

"Aye Riven, we are doing this again." huffed the man as he casually pulled his potions and wards off the table, fitting them in the little bag at his hip. "Just remember, the wind will always be with us." And with that, the man dashed off into the distance.
